name: Browserify-gulp-boilerplate-using-angularjs-written-in-es6
tagline: AngularJS using ES6 with gulp and browserify.
body:
Browserify Gulp boilerplate using AngularJS written in ES6

======== A boilerplate for using AngularJS with ES6 transpiled using Babel. Gulp is used for automating tasks and Browserify for packaging JS in one module and usage of nodeJS style require/exports. ##Usage ```js npm install ``` ```js npm install -g gulp ``` ```js gulp serve ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
